Statuts: 'valide', PatientName: 'Tiger Nixon', StudyName: 'Tiger Nixon', SerieName: 'serie1258', ProtocoleName: 'protocole 5', NbrImage: '95', Comment: 'no', }, ]; const All = () => { const [localData, setLocalData] = useState([]) const [rowData, setRowData] = useState([]) const [chageRow, setChageRow] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { if (data) { setLocalData(data.map((item, index) => { item.key = index rowData.map(i => { if (item.key === i.key) { item.Region = i.Region item.pathologie = i.pathologie item.TypePathologie = i.TypePathologie } } ) return item })) } }, [data, rowData]) function handler(a) { setRowData(a) } function change(a) { setChageRow(a) } return (
) } export default All;
